title: Everyone with their username relating to their main, come here.
body:
Come on out, and join the main name club!

Here is a set of rules.

1. You must have some sort of reference in your name.

2. It must be a VERY obvious reference.

3. You must main that champion (obviously)

Here is the list I have gathered so far by remembering:

Yasuo Main (me)

________ 

Malicious Metal

________

Heretic Lunari (questionable due to ranked history)

________


Glory Ln Death


________


iShenpai (rip)


----------------------


GumGumBlast


----------------------


ImTheSideKick


---------------------



CutestVoidlingNA



---------------------


(Intermission, wait till 1/18/2017  4 PM  Eastern Time

replies.body:
I love hentai and mermaids.




Oh and I also love {{champion:267}}
http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/facebook/001/021/574/461.png
Try me out. Guess who I main XD.
It's clearly Lizard Wizard Renekton.
You figured me out
Why stun, when you can have full mana all game?!

I am here.
http://www.shirtaday.com/pastShirts/20080805_legendBig.jpg

{{champion:90}} main here. Though my name is more vague.

Edit: I've just been on hiatus for some time... Other games are taking my time. I'm not confident enough for ranked yet.
I see monster hunter reference, you have my up vote.

Yes! Glad to meet a fellow Monster Hunter!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

_Ahem._

Vlad main. Tides of Blood is Vladimir's E.

I'll also put forth a name for Tidal Tyrant, Gangplank main/OTP. Tidal refers to Gangplank being a seaman, and Tyrant refers to him being a cruel ruler to his seamen.

> [{quoted}](name=Tides of Blood,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=3hEdGEGe,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2017-01-18T03:28:51.972+0000)
>
> _Ahem._
> 
> Vlad main. Tides of Blood is Vladimir's E.
> 
> I'll also put forth a name for Tidal Tyrant, Gangplank main/OTP. Tidal refers to Gangplank being a seaman, and Tyrant refers to him being a cruel ruler to his **seamen**.

I read that wrong. Oops.
~~Totally not my intention~~

I used to be called ShenpaiNoticey0u Then iShenpai, but my love for Shen just fell over time... They nerfed him pretty hard and with the new meta, I just gave up on him and I am trying to learn other champion. It is sad and a good thing at the same time hehe.However, I hope that someday they'll fix him so I can enjoy playing with my ninja once more =) Also Kudo to your main.

Do you want me to put "iShenpai" or "ShenpaiNoticey0u" on the list in honor of thy forgotten Shenpai from old age?

gonna be honest that was ACTUALLY emotional lol

> [{quoted}](name=Yaśuo Main,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=3hEdGEGe,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-01-18T02:31:30.054+0000)
>
> Do you want me to put "iShenpai" or "ShenpaiNoticey0u" on the list in honor of thy forgotten Shenpai from old age?
> 
> gonna be honest that was ACTUALLY emotional lol

iShenpai will do, and thank for noticing me mighty Wind Warrior =) 

Also, just imagine how mad I was when they reworked him... I learnd the new shen and ''eventually'' got attached but his last nerf  was a Falcon Punch in my face. Anyway, one day he will be back I know it, I just need to be patient and take a small break from league. {{champion:98}} {{item:3070}}

Um.

I'll get back to you after I start  one tricking Jarvan.
Welcome to the party, try the punch!
I guess I am obligated to show up, seeing as how I main {{champion:21}}, even though my name can apply to a number of League females.
It matches {{champion:103}} like a charm.
I guess this is the place for me
"Theyre gonna live until they die"

i main Cass

2 ImTheSideKick

what are their names referring to ? how are they related ?
Malicious Metal is referring to {{champion:82}}
yeah i can see a small connection, what about the sidekick one ?
Sounds like {{champion:64}} or someone with a pet.

Hey, I am a fellow {{champion:157}} main. Sucks that he is banned 18/20 games isnt it?

My name used to be "Shenpai Ekko" for my love of Shen and Ekko, but Riot ruined Ekko for me and my love for Shen is exclusive for the support role, which I dont play often.

I chose "Yonsuo" because 1) it sounds like Yasuo, and 2) My friend who is into astrology said that this name suits me as a person.
He does really does need one.
kill me
